hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
REGION="ap-northeast-1"
ALL_INSTANCE_ID=(`aliyuncli ecs DescribeInstances | jq -r '.Instances.Instance[].InstanceId'`)
for INSTANCE_ID in "${ALL_INSTANCE_ID[@]}" do INSTANCE_STATUS=`aliyuncli ecs DescribeInstanceAttribute --InstanceId ${INSTANCE_ID} | jq -r '.Status'` if [ "${INSTANCE_STATUS}" == "Stopped" ]; then aliyuncli ecs StartInstance --InstanceId ${INSTANCE_ID} --RegionId ${REGION} echo "Started ECS Instance." echo "InstanceId:"${INSTANCE_ID} fi done echo "Complete all jobs!!"
